name: Die, Mailman, Die!
description:
this is a game made for Mini Jam 111

it was inspired by I Wanna Be The Guy, Trap Adventure, and Karoshi

This game isn't impossible. Although, if you have anger issues you probably shouldn't play it.

Credits:

Music from/by Kevin Macleod and Guilty Gear X2

Sound effects from IWBTG

Me for everything else
